mapper.update: update t_sys_users set password = #{pass}, updated_time = now() where id = #{userId}
update t_sys_users set user_certification = #{state}, updated_time=sysdate() where id =#{userId}
mapper.select:
select su.`id`, su.`username`, su.`email`, su.`nickname`, su.`agree`, su.`icon`, su.`loginTime`, su.`balance`, su.`enabled`, su.`account_non_expired`, su.`credentials_non_expired`, su.`account_non_locked`, su.`created_time`, su.`updated_time`, su.`created_by`, su.`updated_by`, su.`activate_code`, su.`user_admin`, su.`user_certification` from `t_sys_users` su
and su.enabled = #{params.enabled}
and ( su.username like concat('%',#{params.username},'%') or su.id = #{params.username} )
order by id desc
